meanings.definition: Large, mostly herbivorous, semi-aquatic mammal native to sub-Saharan Africa.
meanings.sent1: Hippopotamuses are big animals that live in water and eat plants.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of hippopotamuses swimming in the river.
meanings.sent3: The hippopotamuses had a pool party in the lake.
meanings.sent4: The hippopotamuses in the pond were like kings of the water.
meanings.sent5: The hippopotamuses grazing by the river looked majestic.
